column2:
"Okay, now that I have your report, you've cleared
all the conditions and passed the test."

"I hereby grant you approval to extend your
subpalette, <%me>."

"Now then, let me give you some advice.
An extended subpalette gives you more
options in combat."

"But don't get cocky. It doesn't mean that
you've become stronger."

"Keep that in mind and you're bound to live
a longer life."
